ticker: Join us for live DJs mixing every weekend!
Join our VRChat group or visit us on Bluesky for news on our next events.
We are sorry but the ampwave that normally makes silly messages appear here is on holiday, please check our Discord or Bluesky for details of this weekend's event!
It's getting kind of warm, so please remember to drink often to not become a desiccated husk. Look what happened to Japhet.
